mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_collection (user_id, name, description, is_private, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{isPrivate}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, name, description, is_private, created_at, updated_at FROM user_collection WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
